name: A Peaceful Camping Trip
description:
Intro

In this game, you get stranded out in the forest during your camping trip. At daytime you must scavenge for food, and at night you must hide from whatever is lurking in the forest while managing your needs.

Credits

Thank you to Simon Pasi for the player controller, JustCreate for the nature assets, and PijayArt for the survival assets. 

This is just a quick game I put together, so it's not highly polished.
